action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1367 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 45. Record Vote Number: 300.
Amendment SA 1367 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S9848-9851; text: CR S9849) Fulfilling Homeland Security Promises.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1367 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 45. Record Vote Number: 300.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1367 proposed by Senator Byrd.
